verses.verse: An oracle. <S%H4853><s%> The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> concerning Israel. <S%H3478><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who stretches <S%H5186><s%> out the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and lays the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and forms <S%H3335><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> him says: <S%H5002><s%>

"Behold, <S%H7760><s%> I will make Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a cup <S%H5592><s%> of reeling <S%H7478><s%> to all the surrounding <S%H5439><s%> peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and on Judah <S%H3063><s%> also will it be in the siege <S%H4692><s%> against Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

It will happen in that day, <S%H3117><s%> that I will make <S%H7760><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a burdensome <S%H4614><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> for all the peoples. <S%H5971><s%> All who burden <S%H6006><s%> themselves with it will be severely wounded, <S%H8295><s%> and all the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> will be gathered together against it. <S%H622><s%>

In that day, <S%H3117><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "I will strike <S%H5221><s%> every horse <S%H5483><s%> with terror, <S%H8541><s%> and his rider <S%H7392><s%> with madness; <S%H7697><s%> and I will open <S%H6491><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%> on the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and will strike <S%H5221><s%> every horse <S%H5483><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> with blindness. <S%H5788><s%>

The chieftains <S%H441><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> will say <S%H559><s%> in their heart, <S%H3820><s%> <S%H3427><s%> 'The inhabitants of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> are my strength <S%H556><s%> in Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>'

In that day <S%H3117><s%> I will make <S%H7760><s%> the chieftains <S%H441><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> like a pan <S%H3595><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> among wood, <S%H6086><s%> and like a flaming <S%H784><s%> torch <S%H3940><s%> among sheaves; <S%H5995><s%> and they will devour <S%H398><s%> all the surrounding <S%H5439><s%> peoples, <S%H5971><s%> on the right hand <S%H3225><s%> and on the left; <S%H8040><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> will yet again dwell <S%H3427><s%> in their own place, <S%H3389><s%> even in Jerusalem.

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> also will save <S%H3467><s%> the tents <S%H168><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> first, <S%H7223><s%> that the glory <S%H8597><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> and the glory <S%H8597><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> not be magnified <S%H1431><s%> above Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will defend <S%H1598><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> He who is feeble <S%H3782><s%> among them at that day <S%H3117><s%> will be like David, <S%H1732><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> will be like God, <S%H430><s%> like the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> before them. <S%H6440><s%>
It will happen in that day, <S%H3117><s%> that I will seek <S%H1245><s%> to destroy <S%H8045><s%> all the nations <S%H1471><s%> that come <S%H935><s%> against Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

I will pour <S%H8210><s%> on the house <S%H1004><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> and on the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of grace <S%H2580><s%> and of supplication; <S%H8469><s%> and they will look <S%H5027><s%> to me whom they have pierced; <S%H1856><s%> and they shall mourn <S%H4553><s%> for him, <S%H5594><s%> as one mourns for his only <S%H3173><s%> son, <S%H4843><s%> and will grieve bitterly for him, <S%H4843><s%> as one grieves for his firstborn. <S%H1060><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> there will be a great <S%H1431><s%> mourning <S%H4553><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> like the mourning <S%H4553><s%> of Hadadrimmon <S%H1910><s%> in the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Megiddon. <S%H4023><s%>

The land <S%H776><s%> will mourn, <S%H5594><s%> every <S%H4940><s%> family <S%H4940><s%> apart; <S%H905><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> apart, <S%H802><s%> and their wives apart; <S%H4940><s%> the family of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Nathan <S%H5416><s%> apart, <S%H802><s%> and their wives apart;

the family <S%H4940><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> apart, <S%H802><s%> and their wives apart; <S%H4940><s%> the family of the Shimeites <S%H8097><s%> apart, <S%H802><s%> and their wives apart;
all the families <S%H4940><s%> who remain, <S%H7604><s%> every family <S%H4940><s%> apart, <S%H802><s%> and their wives apart.
